data.message:
UCD College Carnival runs all of next week, celebrating our multi-cultural and diverse campus.

Join the celebration at #IamUCD

Click the link for more info
https://www.facebook.com/events/353807341491748/

www.ucdsocieties.com
#GetInvolved

media.alt:
We are delighted to announce the first UCD College Carnival!

College Carnival is a festival which consolidates the wealth of talent, diversity and variety of events on campus into one action packed programme.

Our theme is #IamUCD which recognises our multi-cultural and diverse campus and how each and everyone is a valued and respected part of what makes UCD special.

From musicals to 24hr charity events, 5km road races to outdoor music events and bungee cords and sumo suits in between we hope that there's something for everyone at UCD College Carnival! 

Check out the programme below for more!

Contact info@ucdsu.ie if you have any questions!

data.message:
Attn students aged 12-15 years!

Finishing with a Showcase Performance for all parents & guardians, the UCD Societies Summer Programme covers a week of dance, drama, music & public-speaking, with a special emphasis on the development of self-confidence. 

Courses run June 8-12th // June 15-19th in the UCD Student Centre

Visit http://ucdsocieties.com/summerprogramme/ for more!

www.ucdsocieties.com
#GetInvolved

media.alt: UCD Societies Summer Programme. 8th-19th June 2015. drama | dance | music | public speaking with UCD's award winning student societies.

data.message:
'A Chorus Line' is a stunning musical-vÃ©ritÃ© about a chorus audition for a Broadway musical. Don't miss this 'One Singular Sensation' with UCD Musical Society!

www.ucdsocieties.com
#GetInvolved

media.alt:
'A Chorus Line' is a stunning musical-vÃ©ritÃ© about a chorus audition for a Broadway musical. 

Set on the bare stage of a theatre during an audition, it is based on seventeen Broadway dancers auditioning for parts in the chorus. It tells of the achingly poignant ambitions of the performers and provides a glimpse into their personalities as they describe the events that have shaped their lives. It is renowned as a powerful metaphor for all human aspiration.

'A Chorus Line' won 9 Tony Awards out of 12 nominations including Best Musical, Best Original Score and Best Choreography

This magnificent box office sensation is brought to you by UCD Musical Society this spring in Astra Hall UCD Belfield running April 14th to 18th at 7:30pm each night. 

TICKETS:
â‚¬8 for Members
â‚¬10 for Students
â‚¬12 for Adults
(Group Bookings: â‚¬10 per person, Group bookings >15 people: â‚¬8 per person)

Please note an age restriction of 14+ applies.

For bookings please contact Orla at ucdachorusline@gmail.com

PRODUCTION TEAM:

Producer: Orla Casey
Director: Cormac Gleeson
Choreographer: Aly Coyne
Musical Director: Conal Duffy
Vocal Director: Joyce Murphy
Associate Producer: Chris Casey
Assistant Musical Director: Cillian Copeland

CAST:
Zach: Maurice Wright 
Cassie: Jessica Concannon

Larry: James Glynn

Ensemble: Sally Cahill, Maeve Carey, Shauna Carrick, Laura Davenport, James Glynn, Jack Hanrahan, Jenny Keogh, Ross MacMahon, Darragh McArdle, Joe Murphy, Aoife O'Donnell, Sharon Ryan and Allanah Scully.


Dont miss this 'One Singular Sensation'!

data.message:
Reminder to all University College Dublin student societies that the deadline for receipt of applications & end of year reports is this week

Friday 17 April @ 5pm 

in advance of next Thursday's Society of the Year Awards.

3 copies submitted to the Forum Office
1 copy submitted online via societies.awards@ucd.ie

www.ucdsocieties.com
#GetInvolved

Relay For Life UCD starts at 12pm outside the UCD Sports Centre 

UCD Musical Society's first showing of 'A Chorus Line' is at 7.30pm in Astra Hall in the UCD Student Centre - tickets from â‚¬8!

UCD Drawsoc's AGM takes place in Rooms 5/6/7 in the Student Centre from 5pm

UCD Newman Society are screening 'Fireproof' in the UCD Cinema starting at 8.15pm

data.message:
A reminder for all incoming society society auditors that our first training session is next Thursday afternoon before the Society of the Year Awards.

Please register with the Forum Office in advance to get our updates!

www.ucdsocieties.com
#GetInvolved

UCD Actuarial & Financial Studies Society Little Mick Ag Soc UCD Africa Society Amnesty-International UCD Belfield FM UCD Biological Society - BIOSOC UCD Commerce & Economics Society UCD Chemical Engineering Society UCD Classical Society UCD Comedy Society UCD CSSA UCDTV An Cumann Gaelach UCD UCD dramsoc UCD Drawsoc UCD Economics Society UCD English & Literary Society UCD Civil Engineering Society ESN UCD Dublin UCD Film Soc UCD French Society UCD Gamesoc UCD German Society UCD History Society UCD Horse Racing Society UCD Horticulture Society IndSoc UCD Investors & Entrepreneurs Society Ucd Isoc UCD International Students' Society UCD Italian Society UCD Japanese Society UCD Jazz Society UCD Juggling Society Kevin Barry Cumann UCD Literary & Historical Society UCD Labour UCD Landscape Society UCD LawSoc UCD LGBTQ+ UCD Livingstones Christian Society UCD Malaysian Society UCD Mathsoc UCD Mature Students Society UCD Mechsoc UCD Medical Society UCD Music Society UCD Musical Society UCD Netsoc UCD Newman Society University College Dublin One Health Society Pharmtox UCD UCD Philosophy Society PhysioSoc Ucd PsychSoc UCD UCD RADIOGRAPHY!! RussianSociety Ucd UCD Science Soc Sinn FÃ©in UCD UCD Spanish Society UCD Student Legal Service St Vincent de Paul UCD UCD Volunteers Overseas UCD Vet Welfare

media.alt:
This brief training session will provide an introduction to all incoming auditors of what life is like at the helm of a UCD student society.

Hosted and facilitated by past auditors, the session will focus on planning & brain-storming ideas for the coming year, including advice on how to best use the summer months (especially if youâ€™re away working or travellingâ€¦) and make the most of Freshersâ€™ Week 2015!

Attendance is mandatory for all incoming students society auditors.

Auditors are expected to register with Liz in the Forum Office prior to the Training Day.

For more information on the Training Day visit www.ucdsocieties.com

data.message:
We're nearly there! Here' what you can look forward to for Week 11..

Relay For Life UCD takes place on Devlin Park at UCD Sports Centre from 12 noon on Tuesday to 12 noon on Wednesday

UCD Musical Society's 'A Chorus Line' runs in the UCD Student Centre with nightly performances from 7.30pm Tuesday - Saturday

Launch of UCD Student Legal Service's publication 'Law in the 21st Century' takes place in the William Fry Theatre, UCD School of Law at 7pm on Tuesday

Launch of UCD Medical Society's UCD Student Medical Journal on Wednesday at 6pm in the FitzGerald Chamber, Student Centre

AGM season continues with UCD Mathsoc & UCD History Society on Monday, ESN UCD Dublin & UCD Drawsoc on Tuesday, UCD Musical Society & UCD Film Soc & UCD LGBTQ+ on Wednesday, UCD TradSoc & UCD Netsoc on Thursday

And a reminder that these any many more events are featuring as part of University College Dublin & UCD Students' Union's College Carnival 

www.ucdsocieties.com
#GetInvolved
